metadata.comment: ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 Code
ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 Code
Country administration level 1 identification code.
Country administration level 2 identification code.
Implementation unit identification code.
Site location name.
Site identification code.
The longitude coordinate of the site.
The latitude coordinate of the site.
The reliability of the geographic data.  The best value is 1.
The location type.
The survey type.
The survey year.
The minimum age of the survey participants.
The maximum age of the survey participants.
The number of individuals tested for hookworm disease.
The number of hookworm disease positive cases, amongst the tested individuals.

In relation to hookworm disease, the percentage of those tested, or the percentage of positive cases, exhibiting heavy intensity infection.  At present, the correct definition of this variable is unclear.

In relation to hookworm disease, the percentage of those tested, or the percentage of positive cases, exhibiting moderate intensity infection.  At present, the correct definition of this variable is unclear.
The number of individuals tested for ascariasis.
The number of ascariasis positive cases, amongst the tested individuals.
In relation to ascariasis, the percentage of those tested, or the percentage of positive cases, exhibiting heavy intensity infection.  At present, the correct definition of this variable is unclear.

In relation to ascariasis, the percentage of those tested, or the percentage of positive cases, exhibiting moderate intensity infection.  At present, the correct definition of this variable is unclear.
The number of individuals tested for trichuriasis.
The number of trichuriasis positive cases, amongst the tested individuals.

In relation to trichuriasis, the percentage of those tested, or the percentage of positive cases, exhibiting heavy intensity infection.  At present, the correct definition of this variable is unclear.

In relation to trichuriasis, the percentage of those tested, or the percentage of positive cases, exhibiting moderate intensity infection.  At present, the correct definition of this variable is unclear.
At present, the correct definition of this variable is unclear.
At present, the correct definition of this variable is unclear.
Projected coordinate point.  EPSG 3857
Geographically, the distance between this point and its nearest point, in metres.
The identification code of this observation.
For network analysis.  The source identification code, i.e., the identification - id - of this observation.

For network analysis.  The destination identification code.  If the nearest point is beyond a specified limit, then the destination code is the same as the source code (a special source code synonym).
For network analysis.  Is the destination code the same as the source code (a special source code synonym).
